get.description: Validates if an IP address belongs to the provided countries.

200.description: OK - The IP belongs to the countries provided.

403.description: Unauthorized - The address does not belong to the countries provided.

get.description: Lists sovereign forensics observations for the customer primary country

parameters.description: Filter observations by the selected IPV4 or IPV6 address
parameters.name: ip

parameters.description: Filter observations by the selected industry name
parameters.name: industry

parameters.description: Filter observations by the selected risk types, comma separated
parameters.name: risk_types

parameters.description: Filter observations by the selected infections, comma separated
parameters.name: infections

parameters.description: Filter observations by the selected user behavior categories, comma separated
parameters.name: categories

parameters.description: Filter observations by the selected vulnerabilities, comma separated
parameters.name: vulnerabilities

parameters.description: Filter observations by the selected open ports, comma separated
parameters.name: open_ports

parameters.description: Date interval limiting included observations. When omitted '7d' is used.
parameters.name: date_interval

parameters.description: The max number of observations to return. When omitted 1000 is used.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Opaque token for the next or previous page of results
parameters.name: cursor

get.description: Lists sovereign forensics key performance indicators for companies in the customer primary country

parameters.description: Filter observations by the selected open ports

parameters.name: categories

parameters.description: Date interval limiting included observations. When omitted '7d' is used.
parameters.name: date_interval

parameters.description: Observations start date.
parameters.name: start_date

parameters.description: Observations end date.
parameters.name: end_date

parameters.description: Limits the number of results, after the results are sorted. When omitted all values are returned.

get.description: Lists sovereign forensics key performance indicators for the customer primary country

parameters.description: Filter observations by the selected industry GUID
parameters.name: industry

parameters.description: Date interval limiting included observations. When omitted '7d' is used.
parameters.name: date_interval

parameters.description: Sorts results in ascending or descending order. When omitted descending order is used
parameters.name: order

get.description: A list of statistics data for a given list of industries.

get.description: Get information about the customer's subscriptions

post.description: Add new Companies to user's Portfolio
Manage entity subscriptions in user's portfolio in bulk

get.description: A list of paginated company subscriptions limited to the user's portfolio

parameters.description: If expand=groups is set, include list of groups that contain the subscription
parameters.name: expand

parameters.description: Sort the company subscriptions by the specified parameters, separated by a comma. ‘-’ can be used to prefix a parameter to invert the order.
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Filters by company name (partial match is supported)
parameters.name: company.name

parameters.description: Filters by tier guid (exact match, multiple values are allowed)
parameters.name: tier.guid

parameters.description: Filters by folder guid (exact match, multiple values are allowed)
parameters.name: folder.guid

parameters.description: Filters by subscription type API name (exact match, multiple values are allowed)
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Filters by industry name (exact match, multiple values are allowed)
parameters.name: industry.name

parameters.description: Filters by country code (exact match, multiple values are allowed)
parameters.name: country.code

parameters.description: Filters by group guid (exact match, multiple values are allowed)
parameters.name: groups.guid

parameters.description: Filters by subscribed group guid (exact match, multiple values are allowed)
parameters.name: subscribed_group.guid

parameters.description: Filters by subscription guid (exact match, multiple values are allowed)
parameters.name: subscription.guid

parameters.description: Include expired subscriptions
parameters.name: include_expired

parameters.description: Include subscriptions for all customer groups, if the user has permission to manage own groups
parameters.name: include_all_groups

parameters.description: Include subscriptions to inactive entities
parameters.name: include_inactive_companies

post.description: A list of paginated company subscriptions limited to the user's portfolio

get.description: A list of annotations attached to a set of subscriptions, only insurance users have access to this API currently

parameters.name: folder

parameters.description: The type of company subscription annotations
parameters.name: type

get.description: A list of expired subscriptions for the customer.

parameters.description: An inactive filter to filter out any entities that there is an active subscription on.
parameters.name: include_active_subscriptions

parameters.name: company_guid

get.description: Get a list of my subsidiaries

parameters.description: defaults to my company
parameters.name: company_guid

parameters.description: include additional entities for the specified subscription type. options: my_subsidiary
parameters.name: include_subscription_type

parameters.description: defaults to 1 year ago
parameters.name: start_date

parameters.description: defaults to today
parameters.name: end_date

parameters.description: defaults to monthly. options: daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly
parameters.name: period

parameters.description: defaults to ratings. options: ratings, application_security, botnet_infections, data_breaches, desktop_software, dkim, dnssec, file_sharing, insecure_systems, malware_servers, mobile_application_security, mobile_software, open_ports, patching_cadence, potentially_exploited, server_software, spam_propagation, spf, ssl_certificates, ssl_configurations, unsolicited_comm
parameters.name: lens

parameters.description: include additional entities for the specified subscription type. options: my_subsidiary
parameters.name: include_subscription_type

parameters.description: Limit the companies returned to the specified scope
parameters.name: scope

parameters.description: the format of the response data. options: json, xml, csv
parameters.name: format
